Introduction
This topic contains general information on hospitalization ratings under 38 CFR 4.29, including
when to assign hospitalization ratings
scope of hospitalization ratings
when the provisions of 38 CFR 4.29 do not apply
, and
awarding hospitalization benefits when admission is for a non-service-connected (NSC) disability
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 8, Section B - Hospitalization Ratings Under 38 CFR 4.29
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 8, Section B
